mapper.insert: insert into cstudio_activity (activity_type, summary, summary_format, post_user_id, creation_date, modified_date, site_network,content_id,content_type) values (#{type}, #{summary}, #{summaryFormat}, #{userId}, #{creationDate}, #{modifiedDate}, #{siteNetwork},#{contentId},#{contentType})
mapper.select: select * from ( select * from cstudio_activity where site_network = #{site} order by modified_date desc ) where rownum between #{startPos} and (#{startPos} + #{feedSize})
